title: California tax revenue getting a boost from AI boom -- but for how long?

title: Mobileye to acquire humanoid robotics startup Mentee for $900 million
description: Mobileye Global on Tuesday said it would acquire humanoid robotics startup Mentee Robotics for about $900 million, as the Israeli self-driving technology firm bets on what it sees as the next frontier of artificial intelligence.
content:
The deal highlights the overlap between autonomous driving and robotics, where similar sensing, perception and decision-making technologies underpin the emerging field of embodied AI.

title: Grok faces global backlash over sexualized images of minors
description: Elon Musk's AI chatbot Grok is facing a backlash from governments around the world after a recent surge in sexualized images of women and children generated without consent by the artificial intelligence-powered tool.

title: TV makers tout AI upgrades at CES, as smartphone threat looms

title: Musk's xAI raises $20 billion in upsized Series E funding round
description: Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI announced Tuesday it raised $20 billion in an upsized Series E funding round, exceeding its $15 billion target as it ramps up development of new AI models and computing infrastructure.

title: AI river forecasts may be accurate, but based on flawed logic
description: Artificial intelligence is changing how we predict river flow—but a new study led by researchers at the University of British Columbia shows that these models often get the right answers for the wrong reasons.
content:
